short_summary: Vairations with Apple Care for apporpriate tech means acquisition
description: Apple Mac Books with appropriate access citations for IBM layouts
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation No.

* Reference Number: SSC-24-00025575:T
* Solicitation Number: BPM020832/25575
* Amendment Number: 2

## Procurement Details

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-23T14:00:00
* Publication Date: 2024-02-09
* Amendment Date: 2024-02-15

## Procurement Category and Method

* Procurement Category: *GD (Goods and Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

## Description of Requirement

Shared Services Canada requires the following products:

* 5 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with M3 Pro Chip and AppleCare for Enterprise, storage media retention or equivalent
* 5 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with M3 Max chip and AppleCare for Enterprise, storage media retention or equivalent
* 600 x Apple 15-inch MacBook Airs with M2 Chip and AppleCare for Enterprise, storage media retention or equivalent

Delivery Destination: Ottawa, ON
Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award or by March 28, 2024, whichever is sooner.

## Security Requirements and CLCA

* Security Requirements: N/A
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA): N/A

## Tendering Procedure

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
* Bids must be submitted only to the P2P portal for RFQ Submission by the date, time and place indicated on page 1 of the RFQ.
* To access the solicitation and submit your bid, click the following link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

## Contact Information

* Procurement Officer: Michael Boualavong
* Telephone: (613) 402-8895
* Email: michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Address: Shared Services Canada, 400 Cooper Street, 6th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8

Note: The rewritten entry has been condensed to fit within the 400-word limit, but still maintains all the necessary information for a tender announcement. The text has been rephrased to be more professional and easier to understand. The formatting has also been improved for better readability.
